Uses of Class
MovingImage

    • Uses of MovingImage in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of MovingImage in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Boss
      The Boss class represents the final enemy which the Hero can defeat with all of the same abilities as the Hero.
      class  Enemy
      The Enemy class represents an enemy which can move and deal damage to the Hero.
      class  Fireball
      The Fireball class represents a fire ball which is a projectile that can be thrown.
      class  FireEnemy
      The FireEnemy class represents an Enemy with the Fireball projectile which the Player can defeat.
      class  GrassEnemy
      The GrassEnemy class represents an Enemy with the Leaf Dash move which the Player can defeat.
      class  Hero
      The Hero class represents the playable main character which can move and use special abilities.
      class  MovingPlatform
      The MovingPlatform class represents a movable platform which the Hero can interact with.
      class  WaterEnemy
      The WaterEnemy class represents an Enemy which can create a Waterfall which the Player can defeat.
